--- title: Toy Robot keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A toy robot, toy application where the toy robot doesn't fall off the toy table" ---
{% raw %}

Install¶

pip install toyrobot

Documentation¶

For documentation, refer here.

Run¶

To run the project in command line (after installation):

toyrobot_run --cmd_file_path <path_to_example.txt>

As an example: toyrobot_run --cmd_file_path ./examples/example1.txt

ToyRobot, located at (4, 5) and facing WEST!
{% endraw %}
